name: ocean
description: a side-view scene representing a full ocean ecosystem.The scene depicts zones from top to bottom: intertidal zone, shallow coastal waters, continental shelf, open ocean to abyssal depths.Includes coral reefs, kelp forests, sandy beaches, rocky shores, and deep-sea trenches.

name: estuary
description: a top-down scene representing an estuary biome.Includes brackish water mixing zones, mudflats, mangrove roots, tidal creeks, fish nurseries, and salt-tolerant plants.

name: mangrove swamp
description: a top-down scene of a mangrove swamp.Includes aerial roots, dense green foliage, shallow water.

name: intertidal zone
description: a top-down view representing a rocky and sandy intertidal zone.Includes features such as tide pools and wave-washed rocks.

name: stream
description: a top-down view representing a mountain stream biome.Shows flowing water, pebbles, submerged roots, mossy rocks, and trout.

name: river
description: a top-down view of a river biome.Depicts meandering water channels, sandbanks, reeds, fallen leaves.

name: lake
description: a top-down view of a lake ecosystem.Includes surface water with lily pads, submerged aquatic plants, sediment layers.

name: pond
description: a top-down view of a small freshwater pond.Includes lily pads, algae, reeds.

name: desert
description: a top-down view representing a desert biome.The scene includes features such as sand dunes, rocky plateaus, oases, cacti.

name: grassland
description: a top-down view representing a temperate grassland biome.Includes tall grasses, scattered shrubs, wildflowers, termite mounds.

name: evergreen needleleaf forest
description: a top-down view representing an evergreen needleleaf forest.Includes pine trees, mossy ground, cones, thick tree trunks.

name: evergreen broadleaf forest
description: a top-down view of an evergreen broadleaf forest.Includes dense tropical vegetation, vines, broad leaves, ferns.

name: deciduous forest
description: a top-down view of a deciduous forest biome.Includes broadleaf trees, leaf litter, small streams, fungi.

name: plain
description: a top-down view representing an open plain.Includes flat grassy areas, occasional rocks, burrows.

name: tundra
description: a top-down view representing a tundra biome.Includes permafrost ground, patches of snow, moss, lichen.

name: alpine grasslands
description: a top-down view of alpine grasslands.Shows mountain slopes, grasses, hardy wildflowers, rocks.
